data.title: Washington, DC
data.meta_description: ML Strategies’ Washington, DC page provides details about our government relations consulting group’s DC office, including directions by car and metro.
data.text:
555 12th Street NW

Suite 1100

Washington, DC 20004

Phone: 202.434.7300

Fax: ​202.434.7400

Executive Vice President & Director of Operations

Alexander Hecht

DIRECTIONS

By Car

From Rockville, MD

Take I-270 South.

Take I-270 Spur towards I-495 South / Northern Virginia.

Merge on to I-270 Spur South.

Take Capital Beltway.

Take Exit 43-44 off the VA-193 toward George Washington Memorial Parkway / Georgetown Pike.

Keep right at the fork.

Merge on to George Washington Parkway South.

Take the I-66 East / US 50 exit toward Roosevelt Bridge / Washington / Rosslyn.

Cross Roosevelt Bridge and stay in the center lanes.

Proceed toward US 50 East / Constitution Avenue.

Stay straight on Constitution Avenue.

Turn left on 12th Street.

Continue straight to stay on 12th Street.

Our offices at 555 12th Street NW are between E Street and F Street on your right.

The parking garage entrance is located on 11th Street: continue straight on 12th Street, turn right on F Street, turn right on 11th Street. The entrance will be on your right.

From National Airport / Northern Virginia

Take I-395 North (Washington, DC).

Keep right to stay on I-395 N.

Use the 2nd from the right lane to stay on I-395 N (follow signs for Capitol Hill/Nationals Park/Capital One Arena).

Use the 2nd from the right lane to take Exit 3 for the 12th Street Expressway/Capitol One Arena.

Keep left and follow signs for 12th Street.

Continue straight to stay on 12th Street.

Our offices at 555 12th Street NW are between E Street and F Street on your right.

The parking garage entrance is located on 11th Street: continue straight on 12th Street, turn right on F Street, turn right on 11th Street. The entrance will be on your right.

Via Metro

From Montgomery County

Take the Red Line to Metro Center.

Exit via SW corner 12th and F Streets.

Walk west towards 12th Street and cross.

Enter the building under the 555 sign.

From Northern Virginia / Prince George’s County

Take the Orange, Silver, or Blue Line to Metro Center.

Exit via SW corner 12th and F Streets.

Walk west towards 12th Street and cross.

Enter the building under the 555 sign.
